title: Vitamin E Balm

content: Sunflower oil is high in vitamin E . Use this moisturizing balm on the lips, the tips of the hair or underneath the eyes . It can also be used in place of nail polish to add shine to the fingernails .
1 tablespoon beeswax 4 tablespoons oil, preferably sunflower oil
Heat beeswax and oil in a double boiler until melted. Pour into a small tin. Let cool.
(Courtesy of Béa Johnson, founder of the blog ZeroWasteHome.com )
